post.body: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. Needing to get out of bed for something and coming back to a nice, warm, comfy pillow is one of the best things on earth. I have never understood the cool side of the pillow thing. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.

body: I can easily ignore other people, what I cannot ignore is my brain that has thrown out everything except the functions to perform at these exact things. And my body too to a lesser extent. So when I want to make things, I cannot because my brain has converted my creativity to spatial skills. I cannot feel emotions other than anger hardly at all because my brain switched to worker/warrior mode. I can't see colors as vibrantly because my eyes have devoted more resources to sensing movement and seeing in the dark. I can't think clearly. I can't write or speak as well. I can't be a kind and rational person unless I try really hard, whereas to women and former me it came easily. I can't really do anything I want to do because all my brain has erased it to improve at other things I don't want to do. I literally *can't*. The social expectations are merely an extra burden on top of all of this. And how the rest of my half of the world actually *likes* this is a supreme mystery. Sorry for the poor wording but as I said, I can't do any better.

body:
Probably because both the male body and society are against it. Women are given much more leeway to forge their own path and achieve self-actualization, because their only real duty is to have babies. Men are expected to achieve things and prove their loyalty and worth through actions. Their body and mind develops uniquely to excel in those societal roles, meaning they lose all their other skills, which could be the ones they actually wanted. The only thing that holds men back from offing themselves is their sense of pride in their social duty. And sometimes that doesn't activate, which happened to me, and all I can do is wallow in horror at how worthless I am and how pointless and painful the rest of my life is going to be having unwillingly sacrificed everything good I had to be better at slaving for a society I hate anyway.

I'm not a MGTOW but I can see how suffering this crap 24/7 with no hope of it ever ending could make someone resent women out of envy.
body_html:
Probably because both the male body and society are against it. Women are given much more leeway to forge their own path and achieve self-actualization, because their only real duty is to have babies. Men are expected to achieve things and prove their loyalty and worth through actions. Their body and mind develops uniquely to excel in those societal roles, meaning they lose all their other skills, which could be the ones they actually wanted. The only thing that holds men back from offing themselves is their sense of pride in their social duty. And sometimes that doesn't activate, which happened to me, and all I can do is wallow in horror at how worthless I am and how pointless and painful the rest of my life is going to be having unwillingly sacrificed everything good I had to be better at slaving for a society I hate anyway.

I'm not a MGTOW but I can see how suffering this crap 24/7 with no hope of it ever ending could make someone resent women out of envy.

parent.body: Ain't it ironic that the most 'freest' place in the world censors anime tiddies(and the likes).
parent.body_html: Ain't it ironic that the most 'freest' place in the world censors anime tiddies(and the likes).

post.body:
Hear me out, I’m not sure if this opinion is unpopular **on Ruqqus**, but it is pretty much everywhere.

It may seem that USA is free speech because it has the first amendment and stuff. However, the first amendment is actually very weak. The US government does discreet censorship. The pentagon does their own censorship (in military movies, they cover up soldier suicides).

Not only that, the big tech corporations censoring “misinformation” are actually puppets of the government. US government officials will tell the CEOs of these big tech corporations to censor information against their agenda (masks don’t work, etc) and they of course comply. It isn’t the corporations independent choice. I cannot find a source for this but I saw something on Reclaim the Net.

As long as the government engages in secret censorship, I cannot call USA a free speech country.
post.body_html:
Hear me out, I’m not sure if this opinion is unpopular on Ruqqus, but it is pretty much everywhere.

It may seem that USA is free speech because it has the first amendment and stuff. However, the first amendment is actually very weak. The US government does discreet censorship. The pentagon does their own censorship (in military movies, they cover up soldier suicides).

Not only that, the big tech corporations censoring “misinformation” are actually puppets of the government. US government officials will tell the CEOs of these big tech corporations to censor information against their agenda (masks don’t work, etc) and they of course comply. It isn’t the corporations independent choice. I cannot find a source for this but I saw something on Reclaim the Net.

As long as the government engages in secret censorship, I cannot call USA a free speech country.

I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.

post.title: The warm side of the pillow is superior in every way.

body: Men worshipping women is as much a traditionalist desire as a feminist one. It manifests different but all ultimately comes down to male expendability and worthlessness and females being sacred, innocent beings. Which is unsurprising, because due to the way reproduction works (one man can get thousands of women pregnant) caring about a woman exponentially more than a man is a hardwired instinct. The male body and brain are also designed to perform for their clan whereas the female one retains its natural state aside from reproductive capabilities; and socially, all they're expected to do is have babies. And even if they don't or can't, people will still assume they are or will and don't require them to prove their loyalty to gain love and respect. Basically males are flesh machine slaves for society and our lives suck, but that doesn't matter because only female individual lives and self-actualization are valuable.

body: I was fine with autism before I started puberty and my brain and body started specializing for crap I have absolutely no interest in doing. Now I can't feel anything but monotony and anger. I've lost all my abilities in everything I actually enjoy doing. Even my physical senses become dull. I have no creativity left. I'm nowhere near as smart. I used to be someone you'd consider gifted and talented because my brain actually worked, now it doesn't. I also have ADHD but it had a positive effect on me before, where I was hyperactive but didn't have concentration issues. Now I feel a lot more lethargic and can't focus on anything. And it's extremely irritating that women don't have to deal with any of these awful changes, and even moreso that I'm a sexist or an incel for pointing this out. It's especially bad when I see autistic women or those who are exactly like me because it really cements that this is all the result of hard luck. What I'm probably lacking in is the social reward system, which is supposed to make me want to pursue the tasks I'm developing to fulfill for my clan. Without it the sacrifice is obviously not worth it to me, and you have to admit it's a *big* sacrifice, which I had no say in. We males are just disposable and almost always get the short end of the stick from both our own flesh and society. And without any sense of group identity or responsibility it's all in vain.

Now I can't feel anything but monotony and anger. I've lost all my abilities in everything I actually enjoy doing. Even my physical senses become dull. I have no creativity left. I'm nowhere near as smart. I used to be someone you'd consider gifted and talented because my brain actually worked, now it doesn't. I also have ADHD but it had a positive effect on me before, where I was hyperactive but didn't have concentration issues. Now I feel a lot more lethargic and can't focus on anything. And it's extremely irritating that women don't have to deal with any of these awful changes, and even moreso that I'm a sexist or an incel for pointing this out. It's especially bad when I see autistic women or those who are exactly like me because it really cements that this is all the result of hard luck. What I'm probably lacking in is the social reward system, which is supposed to make me want to pursue the tasks I'm developing to fulfill for my clan. Without it the sacrifice is obviously not worth it to me, and you have to admit it's a big sacrifice, which I had no say in. We males are just disposable and almost always get the short end of the stick from both our own flesh and society. And without any sense of group identity or responsibility it's all in vain.

parent.body:
My upbringing was shit. My family was emotional and mentally abusive, backstabbing, and trashy. I then found the world was that way by the time I was 12. I'm often either a commie faggot or nazi bigot depending on who you ask because politics is shit.

I think I know how you feel, but I genuinely believe you can salvage joy and be happy. The human mind has an excellent ability to self correct, but you have to see the problem and be deadset on correcting it. Obviously you can't simply will away depression or autism anymore than I could just will away ADHD, but it's not unbeatable.

body:
> but happiness and free thought is partially a choice

Only if you have the brain chemistry for it. Which I don't, nor do the vast majority of males. And even those who do, often depend on good circumstances. A few people are lucky and find fulfillment regardless of external circumstances, usually women due to their build.

> So are you going to fully concede to your supposed role, or are you going to be your own man?

I can't, because I'm stuck with a brain that won't let me because it developed against it. Men have to lose all their original abilities and feelings to specialize in skills that benefit the tribe. Women do not because their only real role is to have babies. Women can be themselves by choosing to or to not have children, because they keep the default brain and the default body. Men have everything renovated to specialize in specific skills and lose basically everything else. It's supposed to also make you eager to fulfill that role but it must've broken on me and now I'm depressed and lost. I have to either pretend to be something I'm not inside or pretend to be something I'm not made for. Either way I'm shooting myself in the foot.

parent.body:
@CrystalVulpine I think you and I both agree that a combination of societal progression and biological wiring has made humanity an absolute clusterfuck, and I don't blame either of you for your frustrations.

I know this is going to sound preachy and cliche as hell, but happiness and free thought is partially a choice. Humanity, society, etc are always going to be clown world for one reason or another, but you can choose not to be that.

I'm pretty introverted irl but when I do socialize, I choose men and women who see through the bullshit and want to be better than that. People who choose not to be normies and simps.

So are you going to fully concede to your supposed role, or are you going to be your own man?

And so Vulpine doesn't think I'm singling him out, this goes for you too @QuantumLegion. Be your own woman and not a simp, and don't encourage anyone else to be a simp.

If ya'll didn't have it in you, I don't think you would be on Ruqqus.

body:
> At some point we as a collective must just want it so.

That will NEVER happen. Living as an individual is against every fiber of fundamental human behavior. 99% of people NEED to be part of a clan and groupthink, it's how herd species work. They must either be following or commanding, "live and let live" is the most anti-human value you can have. And they need a main enemy to scapegoat and feel glorious about defeating. Those of us missing this herd instinct are nearly always weighed down with a whole bunch of mental disorders, meaning we are wildly far off of "healthy" human development. Which makes sense, seeing as we behave almost exactly the opposite of them. I would call being able to see past this bullshit a plus, but it also means you're practically your own species trapped in the body of something else, and forced to live as one of them since they won't tolerate no dissent, and even your own body forces you to develop down a path that's best for them and against you.

It's just nature, it will never change, and we're unfortunate enough to not have the blissful ignorance and group identity that we're supposed to and we have to live with it. When it's 1% against the 99% it's barely a question who's going to win, who is good or bad doesn't matter.

Which makes sense, seeing as we behave almost exactly the opposite of them. It's just nature, it will never change, and we're unfortunate enough to not have the blissful ignorance and group identity that we're supposed to and we have to live with it. When it's 1% against the 99% it's barely a question who's going to win, who is good or bad doesn't matter.

>Aka a tool for the collective. It's collectivism repackaged.

I grew up in the 90's. It meant making yourself good at something, anything. Im an individualist. 

>Mediocrity is not award with praise either. Nor is achievement. Or failure. Your loyalty to whatever tribe someone considers themselves part of is what matters. And these days it's becoming ever more global.

I believe in changing this. I want meritocracy. At some point we as a collective must just want it so.
parent.body_html:
Aka a tool for the collective. It's collectivism repackaged.

I grew up in the 90's. It meant making yourself good at something, anything. Im an individualist.

Mediocrity is not award with praise either. Nor is achievement. Or failure. Your loyalty to whatever tribe someone considers themselves part of is what matters. And these days it's becoming ever more global.

I believe in changing this. I want meritocracy. At some point we as a collective must just want it so.

post.body:
Humans are a herd and tournament species, meaning their behavior is inherently violent, group-minded, hierarchical, collectivist, and conformist, and biological determinism plays a big role. Humans feel the best when they have established dominance or punished an enemy they've dehumanized. They need that feeling of "the enemy" to take down and obliterate, and a blind loyalty to their own clan and its leaders. This is why nearly every argument has two black-and-white sides with nearly zero middle-ground; 99% of people do not arrive at such conclusions by their own merit, but through loyalty to their tribe and hatred of "the enemy" one. And if any middle ground ever does exist, it is not recognized; both sides will merely attribute it to the other one. This is not how the real world works, this is how human instincts think it does. The excessive violence and authoritarianism of humans is explained by the ultimate desire to crush and obliterate whoever "the enemy" is, even when doing so is completely pointless. And unfortunately, the desire to identify an enemy to destroy is ever-present, meaning that even if there is no real conflict, humans will find an enemy in something silly or at worst, innocent, out of desperation to quench this instinct.

Within their tribes, humans love collectivism and defined social organization. Everyone follows pre-defined stereotypes and roles so it's easy to make all your judgements about someone by looking at them. Our bodies and brains develop in certain ways to fulfill these social roles. If someone falls out of line, it must be dealt with. If they do not oblige, they are disloyal and must be part of "the enemy". Individualism is tolerated to a degree but only when it's beneficial to the tribe. A good example is how women are afforded much greater freedom with their lives than men because they always have "I can bear children" to fall back on. Whether they intend to or not, or are even able to, humans make quick judgements based on what they see and will assume that she is fulfilling her social duty that way whether it's true or not. Men, however, must prove their loyalty and benefit to the tribe with actions and achievements, or they will immediately stand out as individuals among the brainwashed collective.

Anyone on the outside looking in would be horrified. Even the freest possible human community is very close to communism in absolute terms. Humans on a fundamental level are no different than horses or wolves or other herd animals who are defined by their membership in a collective and aren't allowed to have any life or mind of their own. It's just that these herds manifest in a much larger and more powerful scale in humans.

And if any middle ground ever does exist, it is not recognized; both sides will merely attribute it to the other one. This is not how the real world works, this is how human instincts think it does. And unfortunately, the desire to identify an enemy to destroy is ever-present, meaning that even if there is no real conflict, humans will find an enemy in something silly or at worst, innocent, out of desperation to quench this instinct.

Within their tribes, humans love collectivism and defined social organization. Everyone follows pre-defined stereotypes and roles so it's easy to make all your judgements about someone by looking at them. Our bodies and brains develop in certain ways to fulfill these social roles. If someone falls out of line, it must be dealt with. Whether they intend to or not, or are even able to, humans make quick judgements based on what they see and will assume that she is fulfilling her social duty that way whether it's true or not. Men, however, must prove their loyalty and benefit to the tribe with actions and achievements, or they will immediately stand out as individuals among the brainwashed collective.

Anyone on the outside looking in would be horrified. Even the freest possible human community is very close to communism in absolute terms.
